item.title: Authorization code flow
item.description: Authorization code flow Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: New IAM Developers,Developers new to Okta Links to original docs: Pull from below existing content: Implement authorization by grant type (Authorization code dimension): https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/implement-grant-type/authcode/main/ Structure type: Concept Content type: Conceptual overview Conceptual overviews present a high-level introduction to a topic. For example, there are product \ feature overviews: https://developer.okta.com/docs/concepts/multi-tenancy/ https://developer.okta.com/docs/concepts/scim/ https://developer.okta.com/docs/concepts/auth-servers/ And there are also overviews of lower-level material.
